title: logon
description: A JARM hash sample taken from a server.

acct.description: The web account associated with the logon event.

acct:site.description: The site or service associated with the account.

acct:user.description: The unique identifier for the account.

time.description: The date and time the account logged into the service.

client.description: The source address of the logon.

client:ipv4.description: The source IPv4 address of the logon.

client:ipv6.description: The source IPv6 address of the logon.

logout.description: The date and time the account logged out of the service.

loc.description: The location of the user executing the logon.

latlong.description: The latlong of the user executing the logon.

place.description: The geo:place of the user executing the logon.
